title: Mordakaiser and Drakes
body:
Hey summuners, i has plaing ``MordaKaiser´´ when i realise that he gains control on the ``Drake´´ soul so i have this cool idea.

When he slay the:
``Infernal Drake´´ : His ``Drake´´ basic attacks cause a burn effect on the enemy, that deal demage over time.
``Mountain Drake´´ : ``Drake´´ basic attacks deal bonus damenge on towers.
``Ocean Drake´´ : ``Mordakaiser´´gain a aura that gives him a very effective health regen, that disapears when the drake soul is gone.
``Cloud Drake´´ : ``Mordakaiser´´ gain a aura that boost his movement speed, that disapears when the drake soul is gone.

Thanks for reading and sorry bad english im from Portugal and i will leave the same thing in my native lenguage.

Best luck in the filds of justice.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ola invocadores, eu estava a jogar de MordaKaiser quando eu me apercebi que ele ganha controlo na alma do Dragão, por isso vejam esta idea fixe que eu tive.

Quando ele executar o:
Dragão Infernal : Os básicos do dragão causam um efeito de incêndio nos inimigos.
Dragão da Montanha : Os básicos do dragão causam dano bónus nas torres.
Dragão do Oceano : O Mordakaisaer ganha um aura que lhe da mais regeneração de vida, que desaparece quando o dragão desaparece ou e executado pela equipa inimiga.
Dragão das Nuvens : Da ao Mordakaiser mais velocidade de movimento.

Obrigado por lerem.

A melhor das sortes nos campos da justiça.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: A while back this was asked and a Rioter mentioned it would be cool but that they didnt have time to set this up for his rework.  If they give this more work down the line is anyone's guess now.  Hope Elder Drake is epic if they do update it!

OH really now i look like a fool asking for things already asked for other people.
BTW i think Mordekaiser i kind a non used champ, and if riot make this happen people will give a chance to him and riot could realese a skin Like Master of Dragons Mordakaiser that fit in the dragon trainer line.

Again sorry bad english. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

P.S: do you know where i can submite my world saver champ?

Dont worry about it.  Its the duty of players to help each other out when questions come up.  The question was asked in a developer discussion of how the new drakes work so it was very easy to miss in the sea of comments.

Master of Dragons could be a cool concept, have you seen his Dragon Knight skin?  Its legacy so it might not be in the store for a while.

Submit a world saver champ?  I think there was a post for it a while ago but I didn't look into it enough to find out anything.
